description.p: This release continues to polish Dorsal toward the imminent release of FEniCS 1.0. Please check it out and report bugs.
This release contains an improvement for file locking on NFS.
The binaries for FEniCS 1.0-beta2 are now available for download!
New this time is support for OS X Lion and DOLFIN is now built with Trilinos support in the OS X binaries.
Users of Ubuntu 10.04 and 10.10 should note that an additional PPA is needed to get the latest release. See the web page for details.
The final version of the FEniCS book has now been submitted to Springer. If all goes well, the book should be in stores in the middle of November.
This release brings UFL up to date with the beta2 versions of dolfin and ffc. A few new operators have been added and several bugs have been fixed.
This release contains many bug fixes and implements some long outstanding features in preparation for the 1.0 release.
This release includes some performance improvements for evaluating basis functions. It also adds support for Bessel functions and error functions.

item.title: ufc: Maintainence update of UFC released

description.p: This maintenance update of UFC provides improved CMake support.

A new version of Unicorn has been released. This release adds support for MPI I/O and Cray's Libsci and includes various bugs and portability fixes. It is also synchronized with the chapters in the FEniCS book.
SyFi has been updated to Dolfin/UFL 1.0-beta. Build system changed to cmake.
